attributes.action: match the amount of money pledged by all those who have signed up on the May Day for Nurses website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
May Day for Nurses a website that is inviting Premiership footballers,and indeed any professional footballer,ex-player or management staff
to give up a days salary to help the plight of student nurses.
What I am asking the Government to do, is to pledge the same amount that is collected through the May Day for Nurses website.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
